name: github-adapter
readme:
# Github Adapter

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/github-adapter.png)](https://nodei.co/npm/github-adapter/)

A small javascript adapter library to help other javascript projects to use Github API.

## Installation

Install using npm

```shell
$ npm install github-adapter --save
```

Install using yarn

```shell
$ yarn add github-adapter
```

## Usage

```js
// es6
import GithubAdapter from 'github-adapter';
// es5
var GithubAdapter = require('github-adapter');
```

Initialize the adapter using the github token

```js
var adapter = new GithubAdapter(token);
```

Following API calls are supported

## API

### getRateLimit

Gets the current rate limit status set by the
[rate-limit-rules](https://developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting) using this method

**Parameters**

-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### getCurrentUser

Gets the current user for the token passed

**Parameters**

-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### postIssue

Posts the issue

**Parameters**

-   `owner` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github username or orgname
-   `repo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github repository name
-   `body` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Body of the issue
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### getIssue

Gets a issue

**Parameters**

-   `owner` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github username or orgname
-   `repo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github repository name
-   `number` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Issue number
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### getPR

Gets a pull request

**Parameters**

-   `owner` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github username or orgname
-   `repo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github repository name
-   `number` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Pull Request number
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### getPRDiff

Gets the diff version of a pull request

**Parameters**

-   `owner` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github username or orgname
-   `repo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github repository name
-   `number` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Pull Request number
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### getPRFiles

Gets the list of files created/updated in the pull request.
This also contains the patch which can be used to know the changes made to the file.

**Parameters**

-   `owner` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github username or orgname
-   `repo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github repository name
-   `number` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Pull Request number
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### getRawContent

Gets the raw content for a given full URL

**Parameters**

-   `url` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Absolute full url. Generally the value of property `raw_url`
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### postPRComment

Creates a comment on a given line of a given PR

**Parameters**

-   `owner` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github username or orgname
-   `repo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Github repository name
-   `number` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Pull Request number
-   `body` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** [Comment Input](https://developer.github.com/v3/pulls/comments/#input)
-   `callback` **[requestCallback](#requestcallback)** 

### requestCallback

This callback is displayed as part of the Requester class.

**Parameters**

-   `error` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** The error object
-   `data` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Data received from api call
